entry.def: A groundsheet is a piece of waterproof material which you put on the ground to sleep on when you are camping.

means.word_mean: 1. a waterproofed piece of cloth spread on the ground (as under a tent) to protect from moisture

auth_sentence.content: I pitched my tent on some runs and while I was packing it away, they were running underneath the groundsheet and hiding.
auth_sentence.res_content: I pitched my tent on some runs and while I was packing it away, they were running underneath the groundsheet and hiding.
